scripts.clean: if test junit.xml; then rm junit.xml; fi; if test -d dist; then rm -r dist; fi; if test -d typedoc; then rm -r typedoc; fi; if test -d coverage; then rm -r coverage; fi; rm -rf node_modules; rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo; rm -f npm-shrinkwrap.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm ci && npm run lint && npm run build
